ValidationRule.description: P&P Dates are required for D&O, EPL, FID, M&PL policies.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: $Setup.Master_Validation__c.Account_Active__c && AND( ISPICKVAL(Stage__c, "Policy Delivered / Closed Won"), $RecordType.Name = "Scale", OR(AND( ISBLANK (Pending_and_Prior_Date__c), CONTAINS(Coverages__c, 'D&O')), OR(AND( ISBLANK(Pending_Prior_Date_EPL__c), OR( CONTAINS(Coverages__c, 'EPL'), CONTAINS(Coverages__c, 'FMP M&PL, EPL'), CONTAINS(Coverages__c, 'FMP M&PL, EPL, FID'))), OR(AND( ISBLANK (Pending_Prior_Date_FID__c), OR( CONTAINS(Coverages__c, 'FID'), CONTAINS(Coverages__c, 'FMP M&PL, FID'), CONTAINS(Coverages__c, 'FMP M&PL, EPL, FID'))), OR(AND( ISBLANK(Pending_Prior_Date_M_PL__c), OR( CONTAINS(Coverages__c, 'FMP M&PL'))))))))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Field Required: Pending and Prior Dates are required for D&O, EPL, FID, and M&PL policies.
